text: Kandi Abayahudi n’Abanaswara baravuga bati “Turi abana ba Allah tukaba n’abatoni be.” Vuga uti “None se kuki abahanira ibyaha byanyu?” Ahubwo mwe muri bamwe mu bantu yaremye, ababarira uwo ashaka akanahana uwo ashaka. Kandi ubwami bw’ibirere n’ubw’isi n’ibiri hagati yabyo ni ibya Allah; ndetse iwe ni ho (byose) bizasubira
